languages.text: "Церковь говорит преследовать мутантов, однако для навигаторов сделали исключение".
"The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."
languages.original_text: "Церковь говорит преследовать мутантов, однако для навигаторов сделали исключение".

traits.locale_text: "The Church tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for navigators."
"The Church tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for navigators."
"The Church tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for navigators."
"The Church tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for navigators."
"The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."
"The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

languages.text: « L'Ecclésiarchie nous dit de persécuter les mutants, mais une exception a été faite pour les navigateurs. »
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

traits.locale_text: « L'Ecclésiarchie nous dit de persécuter les mutants, mais une exception a été faite pour les navigateurs. »

languages.text: «La Eclesiarquía discrimina a los mutantes, y sin embargo se hace la vista gorda con los navegantes».
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

traits.locale_text: «La Eclesiarquía discrimina a los mutantes, y sin embargo se hace la vista gorda con los navegantes».

languages.text: “帝国国教要求我们迫害变种人，但导航者是个例外。”
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

traits.locale_text: “帝国国教要求我们迫害变种人，但导航者是个例外。”

languages.text: 「帝国聖教会はミュータントを迫害するよう命じているが、航宙士は例外の状況を作ったんだ」
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国聖教会はミュータントを迫害するよう命じているが、航宙士は例外の状況を作ったんだ」

languages.text: "Die Ekklesiarchie sagt uns, dass Mutanten verfolgt werden müssen, doch für Navigatoren wird eine Ausnahme gemacht."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ekklesiarchie sagt uns, dass Mutanten verfolgt werden müssen, doch für Navigatoren wird eine Ausnahme gemacht."

languages.text: "Ekleşiarşi bize mutantlara eziyet etmemizi söyler ancak Rotacılar için bir istisna yapılmış."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy tells us to persecute mutants, but an exception was made for Navigators."
